reviews.review_text: This place has best Indian food in Vancouver. Discovered it last month and have been here 5 times already. Their prices are so affordable and portions are huge. I highly recommend this place to all Indian food lovers who like authentic spices. 10/10 food and service. Will come here again for sure.

After 5 years  find the authentic  taste of india tried several restaurants  but got best medu vada crispy and big in size  too and chilli gobi got that indian taste unless like other places no  over pouring  of sauces it was right on spot and  in uber we ordered chicken  65 biryani , the taste of chicken 65 biryani was soo good every bit of it is drenched  in  spices loved it And very sweet customer service Enjoyed every  of bit Must try - chilli gobi , chicken 65 , medu vada Pocket friendly , huge portions  undoubtedly  will recommend  this restaurant and would say best restaurant in vancouver Thank you for amazing food and great customer  service You guys deserve 5 stars

It was an amazing experience, the staff are friendly, they provide a great hospitality and ambience. The food was authentic and is a delight. The chilli chicken was delicious, lucky enough to find out that they serve one of the best biryani s   in Vancouver. Will definitely love to come back.

So glad this place reopened! Its my favourite Indian restaurant in Vancouver, their price, quality, quantity and flavour is amazing! They did change their menu after they reopened. I plan to try every one of them eventually. This place is so underrated compared to the other Indian restaurant a few minutes east on the same street thats not nearly as good. I hope customers come here to try first before they go to the other ones. They have daily specials as well! Highly recommend!!

OMG!!! The most delicious and fresh food I had. Came across this place during a walk. Went in with my friend and since then have been a regular here. They have amazing food with good quantity for affordable prices. Below is chili chicken, fish biryani and fish fry. But you guys also need to try their Nilgiri prawns, Grill prawns or for Dosa lovers their Butter chicken dosa  .yummy. You will fall in love with them
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot clevy , being our valuable customer & giving this review to improve our business..

reviews.review_text: I would say again and again that this is a very under rated place. The quality and quality quantity beats the price. My mouth was filled with flavors after tasting their lamb biryani and it did hit right.  We are coming back the next time we visit Vancouver Do not expect this to be a fancy place, and dive in there, it is just a good place to have good food. Curries come with 16oz rice and paratha too. Vegetarian options: Lots of vegetarian options to choose from.

I love this place! I love half price dosas on a Monday, yes there is a line up but honestly worth it. Ive also enjoyed dinner on other nights and love their masala dosa. I also recommend the vegetable uttapam. The service is great, the food is top notch and good value for money. Definitely recommend this place
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your time.. Unfortunately you have reviewed in wrong restaurant page, your review belongs to House of dosa

reviews.review_text: Loved the dishes we had and will be back to taste more. Do wish the menu explained what was in the dishes more and the place needed to be spruced up a bit.  Had lamb vindaloo dosa, recommend it as it was excellent and the onion pagora was great.

We had an amazing experience and food was delicious, the portions were huge and well worth the price. Special appreciation for Mr. Sumon who served us. He is very kind and service was excellent. Highly recommend the restaurant for a one of kind experience!

One of the best south Indian restaurant in Vancouver ---------------------------------- Must Try Vegetarian: Paneer/Gobi Manchurian, DOSA, Veg Biryani Non-vegetarian: Kotha Parota, Mutton Biryani Price: Reasonable Quantity & Quality: Very Good Parking: Street parking/Check at the restaurant (they have limited parking next to 3 Block) Public Transportation: Nearby Bus Stops Crowd: Average Seating: 40 People Service: Quick & Hot Staff: Super friendly ---------------------------------- Highlights: Food taste is really good and quantity is best.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot mr. Ankish Jain for your detailed review..

reviews.review_text: For years I was a dosa factory or House of Dosas kind of guy. When Dosa world came up, i didn t feel the need to try it out. But sincerely, Dosa world should be included in those two. Quality and pricing are par for course and the people running it are gems! Would recommend, and notably no lines or waits! Will be back

It was nice experience last night dinner.  They are serving really authentic south Indian tastity dishes.  Especially variety of dosas and rava Dosas also , even I tried indochinese dishes.  Overall food is best quality.  Thank you guys.  Keep it up.

Dosa world has a ton of varieties in dosas. I tried the pani puri and Rava chicken masala dosa. Unlike other dosa places the stuffing in dosa is full of flavour. The customer service is exceptional  . All the best for Dosa world. I will definitely visit again.

This unassuming place is a gem. Stellar taste and plentiful quantity with a good amount of heat if you want that. My friend also had a massive dosa cake made for her birthday here! Overall good energy. If you want to give good food on decent budget a shot give this a go~ I personally recommend the chicken65 and lamb kothuparta
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot for your review, I hope you were all enjoyed your Saturday evening..

reviews.review_text: The food was amazing! It s a small family restaurant and the food is so fresh and delicious. Definitely an underrated restaurant! I got a Mysore dosa and the vada! It was amazing and I got all this for $11.5. One of the best dosa places in Vancouver. Great people and great food!

We ordered rawa dosa with all vegetables and paneer, it was so well prepared that it did not need and chatni or Sambar with it. On top of it we ordered some idli, vada and Sambar and a paneer dosa. Paneer dosa was extremely tasty too , the restaurant owner gave us some complementary podi masala with ghee, 2 gulab jamun and a strawberry Sunday. It was one of a night
Good food and great service, got our dosas within 5 mins of ordering. Parking is convenient too. Nice ambience and washrooms. And they got great deal on dosas on Monday!

Authentic South Indian style dosa and Idly. I really like the service provided and the all the food items were fresh. Definitely recommend. Vegetarian options: They only offer Vegetarian food and I think its amazing authentic taste brings me back to this place every time.
Excellent food and hospitality. The food was great. Has very good vegetarian options and the sambar is one of the best I had since I came Canada. Utthappam was really nicee
Great service,really love the food. Perfect spices for the night. I Highly recommend to visit this place.

Today i came here first good things its pure vegetarian next i orderd pani puri, panner65, alloo purii, pav bhaji are the best. I never taste this like of poori and pav bhaji in my life Everyone must vist and try Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi jaspreet .. Thanks for your time and support

reviews.review_text: Dosa was so delicious   the owner is so kindly he also provided me food during his shop was closed but I said I m hungry so made a food for me on priority must visit this place
Always an excellent experience being here! Staff is extremely friendly, the food is always very delicious, and the daily specials are a steal! Vegetarian options: Excellent Vegetarian Options!
Best place for dosa in vancouver. Quality is way better than other dosa restaurants. Very friendly staff. Must visit Food

Ajit, my server, (who has 15 years of experience working as a professional chef I found out!) was so helpful in recommending what to try and so knowledgeable about the food. The chicken biryani 65 was the best of my entire life. Everything tasted so fresh! Spicy but not too spicy. Chicken was divinely tender. If youre not a meat eater there was a very wide selection of vegetarian options  . One final note, I arrived around 2ish and the space was lit entirely by the natural light from the big windows. I am a bit light-sensitive and I really appreciated it, so I thought I would mention if anyone else is photosensitive.

Ordered food today for take out and must say they didn t compromised quality for low price. There masala dosa and paneer masala dosa was delicious as filings were spread all over dosa. Mango shake was cherry on the top. Must recommend people to give it as try.
Food is delicious, 5/5  . Finally Vancouver Got a good late night South Indian Restaurant.

Dosa World is our go to Indian restaurant. The food is good and the service is prompt. I like the Idli sambar, paper Masala Dosa and Kuttu Parantha.. I know taste is subjective but do visit the place, I am sure you wouldn t be disappointed! Thanks

THE BEST SOUTH INDIAN RESTAURANT BY FAR! My family is Chinese from Calcutta India, so we are extremely picky with our India dishes. My father and I decided to eat in a few months ago and this is now the only India restaurant I will ever order from. Their dishes are the most flavourful, and consistent I have ever come across and I am never in the slightest bit disappointed. If you are a spice lover like me then this is the place for you! I tell them desi spicy, to where you feel the burn go down Their portions are also decently large for value, and they are the most kind and friendly staff. Pleaseee go try them out and support them because they are amazing!!! My go-to orders are the lamb biriyani and chicken chukka, SO FREAKING GOOD! Parking: Street parking out front
Great food . One of the best Dosa in Vancouver. Shuman is great owner.  Thanks

Had the best biriyani ever. Been hunting for a good chicken biriyani(Chennai style) for over a year.... I ordered chicken 65 biriyani which was around 15cad from dosa world. The taste was amazing and the box was packed to the brim. Ive ordered 3 times now in a week... high time I tried out their other dishes! Cant wait.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot for your time and support...please come 8n for dinning..

reviews.review_text: Amazing, just amazing! Went with friends for dinner to check this place out for the 1st time. We had several vegetarian options and all were stunning. Will be coming back definitely.
Amazing food friendly chef highly recommend whoever want to eat authentic Indian food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much  for your time and valuable comments...

reviews.review_text: Clean cozy ambiance with a nice aquarium, great prices, prompt and delicious,  excellent variety of foods- especially seafood to accommodate those in a party who arent exactly looking for Indo cuisine only ( which isnt common elsewhere). They even have a TV with  to keep the little ones from misbehaving.

Oh my goddddd, the food here is outstanding and I cant stop drooling as I type this. We dropped in for some dosa and ended up eating thair (dahi) vadai and vada kari (curry) as well. Each dish was truly authentic and had different spices that were clearly freshly and individually made. The portion sizes were so generous that we packed the leftovers (enough for one meal). The highlight of the evening is that we decided to take home a package of their chicken biryani because we saw one of the staff members eating it when we entered the restaurant and it smelled like heaven. Of course, we couldnt leave without that dish even though we were full AND we had leftovers. From our experience, restaurant staff from India only eat where they work if the food is truly authentic and tasty. And Im so glad to say that it was both. We are from South India and we live in Vancouver where theres lots of great Indian food, but mostly from Punjab. I think we hit the jackpot here for South Indian food. Well be bringing all our friends and family here for sure. A shout-out to Raja who was incredibly thoughtful with his suggestions, was great to talk to about life back in India, and also snuck in a free gulab jamun (traditional dessert) with our packed biriyani. Thank you!
Sumon our server is very helpful and I definitely recommend and we would comeback again for sure
Had the Chicken Chettinad Masala. Excellent service. Awesome food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot Jeremy , for your support..

reviews.review_text: Had gone here today, amazing restaurant, amazing people, the food is fresh.

We tried the lamb rava, butter masala dosas, fish tikka, chicken biryani, naan, chicken tikka masala and everything was on point and very tasty. Haven t seen any place specializing in both South Indian and North Indian food. Portion size was generous and price was very economical as well. The person on phone whom we called to reserve even went outside to check if they had street parking available!!

Would like to detail my experience. The moment I walked in, the front crew was very courteous to welcome and explain about their menu very patiently. accordingly, I placed the order and they told me it would take 20-30 minutes, I came back to shop  after 20 minutes. The food was completely prepared and packed. I meet and talked to the chef, he asked me to put a review in Google after tasting their food and only if  I like taste. Those words communicated the confidence and trust they are having in their foods quality and taste. Even I reached home after 45 minutes, the food was absolutely delicious and it was holding the real blend of South Indian cuisines flavor. Especially the dosa was really satisfying, even after being kept in container for a while. Thanks to Philip, Venki and KP Wish you all the very best .

The food was awesome and the staffs friendliness was from another planet (inside joke)  . But seriously one of the best biryanis i had in a long long time. Keep up the good work    and will dine here real soon.

Easily one of the most authentic Indian restaurants with a southern flare in Vancouver. Honest , reliable and Natural the place feels laidback and like a southern Indian eatery. We ordered the bhindi butter masala, the prawn biryani, sambar idli, and the mutton curry with Partha. All were enjoyable !

This place is amazing. My new fav spot in Vancouver! Vegetarian friendly which is important to me. Every dish is so flavourful and rich with spices. The staff is so nice and helpful with any and all questions. The Paratha is so crispy, yet chewy. Recommend the Mango Lassi, and the curries. I will try the Dosa next time!

The food quality was amazing. Also service was upto the mark. They have many veg. options and that too with best quality. I thoroughly enjoyed it. Keep it up guys!!! Vegetarian options: They have amazing Ghee roasted masala dosa!

Absolutely delicious and outstanding meal. So authentic and as good as the best meals have eaten in South India, where you can find the very best food in the world. It made my day. Kind, attentive, unrushed and generous service. Freshly made food. I will be back for sure ... with friends. Thank you!

I went with my friends because this is a new place and I wanted to try it out. The server was so nice. The food was delicious. I had masala dosa and my friends ordered vada, paneer dosa and rava dosa. We loved the food. The chef came to us when we wanted to appreciate his skills. They are still a new place and I want to leave a review because they earned it with their amazing service. All the best to the team! I hope you keep this level of service going on!

So I went here recently and when it comes to Indian food I am extremely picky since it has to remind me of back home. I tried all the other Dosa places on the same block and they are all amazing but this place stands out and is the best. The flavors are so amazing!!!! The prices are by far the best as well. The appies curries and dosas are all 10/10. Will be back 1000% if you see this review dont look any further and go inside and eat!

A place to get good tasty food! The biriyani was very tasty and fresh , served by friendly staff. Bill , the owner took extra care of us and ensured that we have a good experience. Will definitely go back there.
Everything was perfect. My Son loved the fish tikka. We ordered spring rolls, kids dosa, fish tikka, butter chicken curry and vege ball curry. All the food 5/5. Friendly Staff.

Visited for the first time here! Ordered idli vada combo and long paper plain dosa! Tasted like home food, especially the idli which tasted like made of fresh batter! Sambar was too good! Would like to try more items on the menu next time!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot prathyush for your time and support

reviews.review_text: I visited this place yesterday and should definitely mention that the food was EXCELLANT. We ordered Chicken 65 with high spice level and it was the yummiest I have ever had till date. I personally would recommend the Chettinad Chicken for main course. The quantity you get is really full-filling. For sure coming back again!
Nice Experience and Very delicious and Authentic Food we had in Vancouver.

Authentic south indian food at the most reasonable place! Visited the restaurant because dosa factory was busy but never going back. Glad that I found the place, the briyani was just awesome with the quantity to serve 2 people. South Indians who miss home made food, try food here!

Was here for late lunch, ordered below items. 1. Sambhar idly and vada sambhar - both tasted excellent.  The sambar had right mix of spices and lentils. 2. Chicken fried rice - meat cooked to perfection, good quantity/portion. 3. Masala Chai - maybe for the first time, felt like a good chai outside of India. 4. coffee - Strong instant coffee, no disappointments. Really hope and wish they continue the same quality of food. Simply, they serve best Indian cuisine in area.

We used to go to the ones down the street but decided to give this place a shot and I m glad we did. Food is phenomenal, customer service is incredible, and staff are all amazing and very attentive/friendly. I got butter chicken dosa and mango lassi and they re one of the best ones I ve had in awhile. 10/10 would recommend and would definitely be back.

Love the dosa from this place...paneer Masala dosa and rava dosa are our personal favorites.. service is a bit slow some times as they r busy with order deliveries.. the chutney portions are very very tiny which is weird with the size of dosa u have.. Otherwise good and tasty food. Vegetarian options: Very good veg options..

Probably the best dosa I had. I usually hate dosa and most other places Im left disappointed because everyone always hypes it up, but this place was really good. The owner was so nice and even brought us complimentary galub jamman. I had the lamb butter dossa and paani puri. Was great!! Me and my friend both really loved it.

Have to say, I enjoyed every single bite in Dosa world. I had a chicken kotthu, omg it was so good   .Considering the quality, the price is reasonable. The service we received was so amazing and we will definitely be back again. They made us feel welcomed and gave us an amazing experience.

Dosa World is one of the most authentic South Indian restaurants in Vancouver. Their sambar gives a genuine Indian feel with the right mix of spices and consistency. The Chicken 65 Biryani is one of their best dishes. Some other must trys are Idli-Vada combo, masala Dosa and puri sabzi. The restaurant is conveniently located on Kingsway,with ample seating. Dosa World is also open till 2:00 A.M, which makes it a great place for a late night meal. The best thing about the restaurant is their extra affordable pricing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot for your time and kindness Mr.Gaurav chadha

reviews.review_text: First ever Indian restaurant in Vancouver  I have seen with that level costumer service. Chef and the manger are super cool and friendly. They made us feel like home. We order few different dosas  and every dosa has a unique taste. Food was extraordinary and customer service was beyond extraordinary. Will definitely recommend this place.

Ive ordered delivery from this place a few times, and every experience has been good. Tonight, Uber screwed up, and I never ended up with my order even though the driver had marked it as delivered. Our food was nowhere to be found, and after asking to connect with the driver on the app, he finally fessed up that a different driver had taken the order. I have no idea why the driver didnt just let us know when the mistake had happened. He then told us to contact the restaurant. The lady who answered the phone was very polite, respectful, and understanding of the situation. She did, indeed, confirm the order number with the delivery driver who took it. She passed the call on to the manager who was equally understanding and helpful. They both took the time to listen, and I never felt rushed or got the impression that I was taking up their time. I know that they were more inconvenienced than we were, as they had to redo the entire order again. Thank you to the staff, kitchen, and management at Dosa World for stepping in and rectifying somebody elses mistake. We were able to get our  order at last without any issues. P.S. For those of you wondering, there are three dosa restaurants on this stretch of Kingsway. House of Dosas, Dosa Factory, and the newest addition, Dosa World, which is this restaurant. I have tried all of them several times, and I can confirm that the food, service, and the people are the best here.
Randomly drive by after 1am. Staff is gentle and friendly. Butter chicken is amazing!! Chinese style fried rice is huge and tasty good too!! Highly recommend!!

One of the good places near Burnaby for a good Indian meal. Highly recommend their Gobi Manchurian, egg fried rice, and biryani. Have been to this place multiple times and these are my usual go to order items. The best thing about this place is that its open late night till 3 am, which is wonderful for the late night food cravings. Few of their curries are specialty as well, like the chicken curry and alappi fish curry.
We ordered Chicken 65 biryani, Butter chicken and fish tikka tandoori. Everything is very tasty. We are happy with the food and service and will be back again!

Masala Dosa and the ghee roast was delicious and tastiest than any other place in Vancouver. Especialy the stuffing was amazing.Also, My Kids loved the chicken 65 and  chilli fish .Friendly Customer service .Definitely will visit again.

This place is amazing. My friend had a crazing for something and they made her a special dish! They are always willing to go theb3xrra mile to make sure you have the best dish possible. Second time in a week me and mg friend come here to eat.
The dosa is so nice. Do try it when youre around

I tried their lamb kothu roti, and it was amazing. The roti was light and fluffy and there was plenty of lamb in the dish and it was soft and delicious. The owner was friendly and made the roti for us even though they werent serving it right now. With their $6.99 Dosa deal, I cant wait to come back and try their Dosa!

Fresh, delicious, authentic tasting food! The customer service was phenomenal and the place was spotless clean. We will be coming back here very often! Thank you Bill and team for such a great first experience!

Great new dosa place in the neighbourhood! Tried the chicken dosa, butter lamb dosa, and gobi 65. Both dosas were very good with plenty of filling. I would say the dosa itself is slightly thicker than youll find at the other two neighbourhood dosa places, but still delicious. The batter on the gobi 65 was a bit heavier than I like, but the spicing was nice. Service was friendly and quick. Were just around the corner so well definitely be back.

I ordered the onion masala dosa and chicken 65 biryani with mango lassi.  The food tastes delicious and the lassi was awesome. The one thing which is the best is the quantity they are offering  and reasonable prices gonna visit again
Very delicious food.i had dosa in dinner , was so yummy specially there samber kari.chicken curry and paneer was also very tasty. Overall great experience. Must visit again

Great food, great service and great chef! I ordered muttar paneer dosa and gun powder idly. The gun poweder idly was a little different than the other restaurants that serve this in this area but honestly, it tested way better than the other restaurants. Dosa was perfect too. It is a new restaurant and I wish them all the best for their great future!

Best curry I ve ever had. Alappi fish curry and the lamb chettinad are to die for. Can t wait to be back. Service was friendly, helpful and excited to have us. I felt welcomed and cared for, loved it!

We went here recently as I had a super huge craving for South Indian cuisine! I wanted to eat freshly made egg/chicken kothu parotta. It was OMG, as good as or even better than the street food in Chennai ! I would definitely recommend this place for freshly made parottas !!
Great food. I think it s underpriced. Honestly, we came here because the other places down the road were too packed and I m really glad we came here. We ll be back again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot for your time & support...

reviews.review_text: Best SERVICE AND BEST FOOD EVER.....@ RESONABLE PRICE Parking: On Kingsway Food : 5/5 |
I often visit this place. Always loved South Indian dishes here like Mysore masala, idli . Rasam is a must try.

This is one of a kind restaurant, that has wide variety of dosas. We tried few dosas each of it has a unique taste. When coming to service it was awesome, chef is very patient and very friendly. Overall it was splendid for an unexpected visit.

This is one of the best Indian restaurants I have visited till now in Vancouver, I was so impressed with their hospitality and the owner is very kind and Polite. They have wide variety of menu compared to other restaurants and taste was awesome.. I ordered Special Kari Dosa which was mouth watering and delicious. All da best DOSA WORLD. I recommend people to try this place!!
It was really nice experience. The food was tempting and really according to ones palate. The staff was also quite attentive and responding. It was a Nice experience on the whole. Highly recommended
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot for your time and review...

reviews.review_text: Amazing staff! They are always so kind and friendly. The food here is also so delicious, and I recommend their biryani.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot for your time and support

reviews.review_text: My son Reece and I were their very first customers and we had a fabulous meal of chicken and spinach Dosa and lamb dosa followed up by gulab jamun and rasamalai. The manager Elango looked after us beautifully.

Awesome place with very good service and they really believe in customer satifaction. I went there 2 days in a row. The food quality and the service was on the top. Whenever I get a chance I would love to go back and have their fresh and tasty food. Really Thankful to the full team of Dosa World
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot for your time to giving this review..

reviews.review_text: Dosa was really good. Not the regular kind of dosa what we get in other places. This kind of dosa stands out. Enjoyed Every bite of it. Vegetarians paneer masala dosa will be a feast for you all. No need to mention the non veg dosa s. Tried almost every dosa they had.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your time & giving review to help us growing our business..

reviews.review_text: Food is delicious here and freshly prepared , you get great amount of food quantity. In whole Vancouver no other restaurant can compete this one in terms of food quantity. Also restaurant has great hospitality for their customers
We both ordered the Chana Puri for dinner, and the Chana Masala curry was amazing, so we ordered some rice to make sure it didnt go to waste. Interested to try the other dishes!

Best service for delivery individuals and the Indian uncle who probably owns the restaurant treats everyone with immense respect and friendliness. Kudos to him for such an amazing service to his customers!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Rafid Al Mumit, huge appreciation from our favorite customer.

reviews.review_text: Place is quiet and really cozy. I had noodles and panner manchurian. They were best i had in a while. Service was friendly and welcoming. It is worth visiting.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks alot for your time and support

reviews.review_text: Delicious food with reasonable price. Liked  dosas and authentic hyderabad style chicken dum Biryani. Staffs were very friendly. I Highly recommend this place.
Dosa and Chole puri were really delicious
This was my 4th visit and I really love the food . Their masala dosa and chicken biryani are delicious.
Delicious food with good portions. Friendly service and kid friendly. Must try and highly recommend.

Welcome new addition on the block. You can tell they take pride in their service and food. Times there so far have been very tasty and great value for what you get. Check them out and help support this local business
Really impressed by dosa world. Best dosas and Indian curry I ve had in Vancouver yet. Nice and comfortable restaurant inside. Friendly staff and unimaginably delicious food.
Loved the ambiance and the service. Lovely people and the food was really amazing ordered chicken 65 biryani and the pieces were perfectly cooked. Thankyou
Very professional and good customer service. Prompt service. Neat and clean. Very delicious food.South indian best restaurant in Vancouver.  Continue excellent work.
It was a great experience. Loved the food. The staff was very friendly and welcoming especially Mr. Ajit. Thank you Dosa world!
Very good food and exceptional service. Ajit was our server and he was attentive and friendly. I definitely recommend coming here.
This place is fire. Thali is BOMB. Fried rice with Manchurian chicken  . Thank you and keep up the good work!!
